render_environment_variables.name: N8N_BLOCK_ENV_ACCESS_IN_NODE
render_environment_variables.description: Allow environment access in code nodes

installation_steps.step_3: Click on the service to open details
installation_steps.step_6: Click 'Add Environment Variable' for each variable above
installation_steps.step_7: Enter Name and Value exactly as shown
installation_steps.step_9: Wait 5-10 minutes for auto-deployment to complete
installation_steps.step_10: Check Logs tab for successful installation messages

success_indicators: Render logs show: 'Community package @telepilotco/n8n-nodes-telepilot installed successfully'
n8n Settings â†’ Community Nodes shows: @telepilotco/n8n-nodes-telepilot (INSTALLED)
Add Node dialog includes 'TelePilot Trigger' and 'TelePilot Action' options
No 'Unrecognized node type' errors in workflows

troubleshooting.if_installation_fails: Remove all community node variables, add just N8N_COMMUNITY_PACKAGES first, deploy, then add others
troubleshooting.if_nodes_not_recognized: Restart the service and clear browser cache
troubleshooting.if_build_fails: Check Render logs for specific error messages
troubleshooting.alternative_method: SSH into container and run: cd /usr/src/app && npm install @telepilotco/n8n-nodes-telepilot
